metadata.description: More Green Hornet excitement from Dynamite as they present an incredible spin-off featuring the all-new Kato and the mysterious Black Hornet! Featuring elements direct from Kevin Smith's unproduced screenplay, writer Ande Parks -joined by the sensational Ale Garza! - fills in the blanks on the new Kato, the old Kato and the mystery of the Black Hornet! 'Not my Father's Daughter' is filled with excitement, action, intrigue and more - 5 issues of Fury as the world of Kato old and new is rocked forever and sets a course that intertwines with the destiny and legend of the Green Hornet!
metadata.name: Kato
